mapper.sql: a.indexid AS "indexid", a.indextime AS "indextime", a.deviceid AS "deviceid", a.dataeffrate AS "dataeffrate", a.meteronlinerate AS "meteronlinerate", a.realcollectrate AS "realcollectrate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collectindexday( indexid, indextime, deviceid, dataeffrate, meteronlinerate, realcollectrate ) VALUES ( #{indexid}, #{indextime}, #{deviceid}, #{dataeffrate}, #{meteronlinerate}, #{realcollectrate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE collectindexday SET indexid = #{indexid}, indextime = #{indextime}, deviceid = #{deviceid}, dataeffrate = #{dataeffrate}, meteronlinerate = #{meteronlinerate}, realcollectrate = #{realcollectrate} WHERE id = #{id}
